description: Configuration for deploying the LangGraph multi-agent AI project via LangGraph Studio.

agents.name: SUPERVISOR
agents.description: Main supervisor agent that routes requests to specialized agents.

agents.name: DEBUGGER
agents.description: Agent responsible for debugging code, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: CONTEXT_MANAGER
agents.description: Agent responsible for managing conversation context, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: PROJECT_MANAGER
agents.description: Agent responsible for managing project timelines and tasks, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: PROFESSIONAL_COACH
agents.description: Agent providing professional and career guidance, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: LIFE_COACH
agents.description: Agent providing lifestyle and personal advice, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: CODER
agents.description: Agent that assists with coding tasks, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: ANALYST
agents.description: Agent specializing in data analysis, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: RESEARCHER
agents.description: Agent that gathers and summarizes research and news, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: GENERAL_ASSISTANT
agents.description: Agent for general queries and assistance, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: NEWS_REPORTER
agents.description: Agent that searches, researches, explains and summarizes news reports, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: CUSTOMER_SUPPORT
agents.description: Agent that provides customer support and assistance, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: MARKETING_STRATEGIST
agents.description: Agent that provides marketing strategy, insights, trends, and planning, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: CREATIVE_CONTENT
agents.description: Agent that provides creative content, marketing copy, social media posts, or brainstorming ideas, managed by the supervisor.

agents.name: FINANCIAL_ANALYST
agents.description: Agent that provides financial analysis, market data, forecasting, and investment insights, managed by the supervisor.
